h2_title: Flint Chief Boss Fight and Guide
content: There are three areas you can concentrate attacks, which are its body and two hands. It's best to target the two hands, as these are actually breakable and by removing them, the Flint Chief becomes a lot more unsteady on its feet. Focus combos, follow-ups, and heavy attacks on its hands to remove them as quickly as possible.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Chief.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Chief', specifically from the subsection 'Flint Chief Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
There are three areas you can concentrate attacks, which are its body and two hands. It's best to target the two hands, as these are actually breakable and by removing them, the Flint Chief becomes a lot more unsteady on its feet. Focus combos, follow-ups, and heavy attacks on its hands to remove them as quickly as possible.
